agents.name: ShortWave
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered email client and productivity platform
agents.longDescription: Shortwave is an advanced email client that uses AI to enhance email management and productivity. It integrates with Gmail and Google Workspace accounts, offering features like email summarization, AI-powered writing assistance, smart inbox organization, and task management. The platform aims to streamline email workflows and reduce time spent on email-related tasks.
agents.tags: AI email, productivity tools, email management, machine learning, workflow optimization

agents.name: Mindy AI
agents.longDescription: Mindy is an AI-powered email assistant that integrates seamlessly into your inbox to help with tasks like research, writing, scheduling, and more. It acts as a personal Chief of Staff, handling complex queries and automating routine tasks to boost productivity12.
agents.tags: AI assistant, productivity tool, email automation, personal assistant, task management

agents.name: Email AI Extractor
agents.shortDescription: Use AI to Automatically find and save emails from web pages to a CSV file.
agents.longDescription:
Use AI to automatically discover and save email addresses from web pages into a CSV file. Quickly build email lists and accelerate your lead generation!

Virtually all relevant contact information is easily accessible on most websites.

By extracting such information from websites, you can quickly compile a comprehensive database of leads, complete with all the necessary contact information such as email addresses, phone numbers, social media profiles, etc.

agents.name: Inbox Zero
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered email management and productivity tool
agents.longDescription: Inbox Zero is an AI-powered email management platform that helps users clean up their inbox, automate responses, block unwanted emails, and gain insights into their email habits. It aims to reduce email-related stress and improve productivity by streamlining email workflows.
agents.tags: AI assistant, email management, productivity tool, inbox organization, email automation

agents.name: Athena
agents.longDescription: Hercules’ Athena streamlines email filing to the enterprise’s document management system (DMS). By leveraging advanced algorithms, Athena predicts the correct filing destination for emails within Outlook inboxes and the DMS. This solution automatically identifies client details, matter, author, and document types for every email. By automating this process, Athena enables enterprises to maintain compliance standards while allowing employees to concentrate on more meaningful, high-value tasks.

agents.name: NewMail AI
agents.shortDescription: Your Personalized Executive Assistant - Email, to-do, calendar, contacts, whatsapp(soon)
agents.longDescription: NewMail AI is an intelligent agent designed to help busy professionals stay on top of their email, calendar, tasks, and contacts. With seamless integration into your existing workflows, NewMail AI automates inbox organization, drafts context-aware email replies, manages to-dos, and provides daily briefings. It adapts to your priorities and communication style, ensuring you always have the right information at the right time to focus on strategic and empathetic decision-making.
keyFeatures: Inbox Intelligence: Personalized email prioritization and smart drafting.
Secure by Design: Privacy-centric architecture with no data storage.
Proactive Insights: Daily briefings and real-time updates.
Schedule Mastery: Dynamic calendar and task management.
